iu kin bo hnh
(THE FIFTH LABLE ch h tr bo hnh sn phm h hng trong iu kin s dng bnh thng theo tiu chun ca nh sn xut){" "}
Thng 1
  • 1 i 1 ti nh, nu ht hng i khc THE FIFTH LABLE tr li tin chnh lch nu c.
  • Hoc sn phm th nhn li tin 80% gi tr.
  • Khch hng phi gi nguyn v hp v ph kin i km.
Thng 2 12
  • BK Robotic h tr bo hnh theo tiu chun hng hoc chuyn hng bo hnh khi cn.
Thng 2 12
  • Khng i tr, BK Robotic h tr bo hnh theo tiu chun hng hoc chuyn hng bo hnh khi cn.
  • Sn phm khng li Khng i tr.
  • Sn phm li do ngi dng Khng bo hnh i tr. BK Robotic h tr chuyn hng bo hnh, khch hng chu ph sa cha.
Nhng trng hp khng c bo hnh
  • Khch hng t ng tho my.
  • S dng sai tiu chun ca nh sn xut.
  • {" "} S dng sai in p quy nh, qu cng sut ca thit b hoc chy n, ri v, va p, hng hc vt l.
  • {" "} Cc li do ngi dng cn pin v khng sc trong thi gian di dn n my khng th sc c. Hong Kin s h tr chi ph thay pin gi hp l nht cho cc bn.
  • H hng do thin tai, ha hon, ng vt, cn trng hoc con ngi lm hng.
  • H hng do khch hng thay i ROM hoc can thip n h iu hnh my;
  • Qu thi hn bo hnh ghi trn phiu bo hnh.
  • Khng c phiu bo hnh, phiu bo hnh khng ng hoc phiu bo hnh b ty xa, khng nguyn vn.

Chnh sch vn chuyn
BK Robotic c dch v vn chuyn uy tn, m bo cc mt hng n tay qu khch c an ton.
Cch 1: Giao hng trc tip ti ca hng

Hy trc tip n a ch cc showroom ca BK Robotic la chn sn phm, thanh ton v nhn sn phm trc tip ti ca hng.

Cch 2: Giao hng min ph ni thnh TP H Ch Minh

Nu bn khng mun trc tip n ca hng. BK Robotic sn sng giao hng min ph trong cc qun ni thnh Thnh ph H Ch Minh . Xin vui lng gi s hotline t hng v nhn sn phm ti a ch bn mong mun.

Cch 3: S dng hnh thc Giao hng thu tin COD (Cash on Delivery)

i vi cc bn xa Tp H Ch Minh, mun s dng hnh thc COD (thanh ton khi nhn hng), cc bn vui lng lin h vi BK Robotic c hng dn. y l hnh thc thanh ton COD (Cash on Delivery) Cc bn s thanh ton trc tip cho bn chuyn pht sau khi nhn c hng. Vi hnh thc ny, m bo n hng c xc nhn, BK Robotic c 2 hnh thc mua hng v thanh ton nh sau:

  • Mt l, chuyn khon t cc trc t 200.000 500.000 VN. Khi nhn c hng khch hng s thanh ton nt s tin cn li v tin cc vn chuyn.
  • Hai l, Chuyn khon ton b 100% tin hng. Bn s c BK Robotic h tr cc ph vn chuyn ty thuc vo gi tr n hng.
); }; const Payment = () => { return (
Chnh sch vn chuyn
Khch hng c th tham kho cc phng thc thanh ton sau y v la chn p dng phng thc ph hp:
Thanh ton trc tip (Khch hng nhn hng ti showroom):

Qu khch c th s dng tin mt, chuyn khon, VNPAY QR hoc qut th

Thanh ton sau (COD giao hng v thu tin tn ni):

Qu khch hng cc tnh tp trn lnh th Vit Nam, khi nhn hng v kim tra hng xong qu khch s thanh ton tin mt cho nhn vin giao hng.

Thanh ton online qua th tn dng, chuyn khon:

i vi cc bn xa Tp H Ch Minh, mun s dng hnh thc COD (thanh ton khi nhn hng), cc bn vui lng lin h vi BK Robotic c hng dn. y l hnh thc thanh ton COD (Cash on Delivery) Cc bn s thanh ton trc tip cho bn chuyn pht sau khi nhn c hng. Vi hnh thc ny, m bo n hng c xc nhn, BK Robotic c 2 hnh thc mua hng v thanh ton nh sau:BK Robotic chp nhn hnh thc thanh ton chuyn khon ngn hng, qu khch c th chuyn khon vo mt trong cc ngn hng di y:

  • {" "} Ngn hng OCB Chi nhnh Th c
    Tn ti khon: Trng Ngc Trc Qunh
    S Ti khon: 0003100013385004
  • {" "} Ngn hng BIDV Chi nhnh Th c
    Tn ti khon: Nguyn Trm Anh
    S Ti khon: 11110000088864

Chnh sch i tr, khiu ni
Chng ti c quy trnh x l chuyn nghip trong trng hp qu khch c yu cu i tr sn phm hoc khiu ni v sn phm, cht lng dch v. Vi tinh thn bo v quyn li khch hng l trn ht, qu khch c th an tm mua sm ti BK Robotic.
iu kin i tr
  • Sn phm cn nguyn vn, y bao b v hp, ha n mua hng, my cn nguyn vn khng b try xc.
  • Thi gian: trong vng 07 ngy k t ngy mua.
  • iu kin bo hnh ca nh sn xut.
    • Lu :
    Cc sn phm khng c i tr: ht thi gian i tr, khng cn y , nguyn vn, b mp mo, sn phm try xc.
Chnh sch khiu ni

  • i tng khiu ni:

    {" "}

    L t chc, c nhn c s dng cc sn phm, dch v do BK Robotic cung cp (trng hp c bit khch hng c th y quyn cho ngi i din hp php).

  • Hnh thc khiu ni:

    {" "}

    Khch hng khi c khiu ni, phn nh v sn phm, dch v do BK Robotic cung cp c th khiu ni trc tip ti cc Showroom/i l hoc gin tip bng cch gi in n ca hng, gi mail, gi vn bn hoc cc hnh thc khc

  • Nguyn tc gii quyt:

    {" "}

    BK Robotic c quyn t chi v khng gii quyt cc khiu ni khng c c s, bng chng hoc khng trc thuc n v gii quyt.

Quy trnh x l khiu ni

Bc 1. Tip nhn v hi m khiu ni{" "}

{" "}

Mi CBNV, n v, Showroom thuc BK Robotic u c trch nhim tip nhn phn nh, khiu ni ca khch hng. Gi vn bn hi m khiu ni trong vng 03 ngy k t ngy nhn c khiu ni (i vi khiu ni bng vn bn, email, in thoi) hoc gi khch hng bn copy phiu tip nhn khiu ni c xc nhn ca cp TP Dch v Khch hng i vi khiu ni trc tip ti im giao dch.

Bc 2: Xc minh, x l

{" "}

Sau khi tip nhn c phn nh, khiu ni ca khch hng, b phn tip nhn s ch ng kim tra, gii quyt trong phm vi chc nng v quyn hn ca mnh. Cc khiu ni khng thuc thm quyn gii quyt ca b phn tip nhn s c phi hp chuyn cp cao hn gii quyt theo thm quyn (Khng qu ngy k t khi tip nhn).

Bc 3: n v, C nhn c thm quyn xem xt, gii quyt{" "}

{" "}

n v, c nhn thuc thm quyn theo quy nh ca BK Robotic tin hnh kim tra, xc minh thng tin khiu ni ca khch hng a ra kt lun cui cng

Bc 4: Tr li khch hng{" "}

{" "}

Khi c kt qu kim tra, xc minh BK Robotic s tr li khch hng theo nhiu hnh thc: Gi in thoi, n gp trc tip, gi vn bn phc p, gi mailty theo hnh thc khiu ni ban u. Nu khch hng khng ng vi kt qu gii quyt: Trong thi gian 30 ngy k tip b phn chc nng c trch nhim kim tra li t u thng tin khiu ni v phc p cho khch hng.

Bc 5: Kt thc khiu ni{" "}

{" "}

Lu h s v kt thc khiu ni.

Chnh sch bo mt
Chng ti thu thp nhng thng tin no?

Chng ti thu thp thng tin t bn khi bn ng k trn trang web ca chng ti, t hng, ng k nhn bn tin ca chng ti hoc in vo mt biu mu.

Khi t hng hoc ng k trn trang web ca chng ti, bn c th c yu cu nhp ca bn: tn, a ch email hoc a ch gi th. Bn c th truy cp trang web ca chng ti nc danh.

Chng ti s dng thng tin ca bn cho nhng mc ch g?

Bt k thng tin chng ti thu thp t bn c th c s dng theo mt trong cc cch sau y:

  • c nhn ha tri nghim ca bn (thng tin ca bn s gip chng ti p ng tt hn nhu cu c nhn ca bn).
  • ci thin trang web ca chng ti (chng ti lin tc c gng ci thin cc dch trang web ca chng ti da trn nhng thng tin v phn hi chng ti nhn c t bn).
  • ci thin dch v khch hng (thng tin ca bn s gip chng ti c hiu qu hn p ng yu cu dch v khch hng ca bn v nhu cu h tr).
  • x l cc giao dch.

Thng tin ca bn, d cng khai hay n danh, s khng c bn, trao i, chuyn nhng, hoc cho bt k cng ty no khc vi bt k l do no, m khng c s ng ca bn, khc hn l cho mc ch r rng ca vic cung cp cc sn phm mua hoc dch v yu cu.

  • qun l mt cuc thi, khuyn mi, kho st, tnh nng trang web khc.
  • gi email nh k.
  • Cc a ch email m bn cung cp c x l, c th c s dng gi cho bn cc thng tin v cp nht lin quan n t hng ca bn, ngoi vic tip nhn thng tin mi t cng, cp nht, sn phm hoc dch v c lin quan thng xuyn, vv
  • Lu : Nu bt c lc no bn mun hy ng k bn c thc hin t phn hy ng k nhn email trong tng lai, chng c b tr di cng ca mi email.
Chng ti bo v thng tin ca bn nh th no?

Chng ti thc hin mt lot cc bin php an ninh duy tr s an ton ca thng tin c nhn ca bn khi bn t hng hoc nhp, gi, hoc truy cp thng tin c nhn ca bn.

Chng ti cung cp vic s dng mt my ch an ton. Tt c cc thng tin nhy cm cung cp c truyn qua Bo mt (SSL) cng ngh Socket v sau m ha thnh c s d liu cc nh cung cp cng thanh ton ca chng ti ch c th truy cp bi nhng ngi c y quyn c quyn truy cp c bit ti h thng nh vy, v c yu cu gi cho cc thng tin b mt.

Chng ti s dng cookies?

C (Cookie l nhng file nh m mt trang web hoc dch v ca nh cung cp ca n lu my tnh ca bn trong cng thng qua trnh duyt Web ca bn (nu bn cho php) cho php cc trang web hoc cc h thng cung cp dch v nhn ra trnh duyt v my tnh ca bn v ghi nh thng tin nht nh).

Chng ti s dng cookies gip chng ta nh v x l cc mt hng trong gi hng ca bn, hiu v lu cc s thch ca bn cho ln truy cp sau v theo di cc qung co.

Do chng ti tit l bt c thng tin cho bn ngoi?

Chng ti khng bn, thng mi, hoc chuyn giao cho bn ngoi nhng thng tin c nhn ca bn. iu ny khng bao gm cc bn th ba ng tin, ngi h tr chng ti trong vic iu hnh trang web ca chng ti, hot ng kinh doanh ca chng ti, hoc phc v bn, min l cc bn ng gi b mt thng tin ny. Chng ti cng c th tit l thng tin ca bn khi chng ti tin rng vic ny l tun th php lut, thc thi chnh sch trang web ca chng ti, hay bo v mi ngi hoc mt ngi v quyn ti sn, hoc s an ton. Tuy nhin, thng tin khng nhn dng c nhn c th c cung cp cho cc bn khc tip th, qung co, hoc s dng khc.

Lin kt ca bn th ba

Chng ti c th cung cp sn phm ca bn th ba trn trang web ca chng ti. Nhng trang web ca bn th ba c chnh sch bo mt ring bit v c lp. Do chng ti khng c trch nhim hoc trch nhim i vi cc ni dung v hot ng ca cc trang web lin kt. Tuy nhin, chng ti tm cch bo v s ton vn ca trang web ca chng ti v hoan nghnh bt k thng tin phn hi v cc trang web ny.

Chnh sch ch p dng website trc tuyn

Chnh sch bo mt trc tuyn ny ch p dng cho cc thng tin thu thp c thng qua trang web ca chng ti v khng cho thng tin thu thp c n.

S ng ca bn

Bng cch s dng trang web ca chng ti, bn ng vi chnh sch bo mt ca chng ti.

Thay i chnh sch mt ca chng ti

Nu chng ti quyt nh thay i chnh sch bo mt ca chng ti, chng ti s ng nhng thay i trn trang ny.

  • setPolicy("VC")} > Chnh sch vn chuyn

  • setPolicy("BM")} > Chnh sch bo mt
